message: Missing Settlement Instructions (SSI). You need to configure SSI for this counterparty.
command: Navigate to: Static Data > Counterparty > SSI Configuration

message: Invalid or missing holiday calendar. Configure holiday calendar for this currency pair.
command: Navigate to: Static Data > Holiday Calendar > Add Calendar

message: Missing Legal Entity information. Add LEI code and legal entity details.
command: Navigate to: Static Data > Legal Entity > Add Entity

message: Invalid or missing book. Verify book configuration in Static Data.
command: Navigate to: Static Data > Book > Verify Configuration

message: Insufficient permissions. Contact your administrator to grant required access.
